sentences.en: A sniff of the soup cooking on the stove made me hungry.

sentences.en: Ask the child to sniff after you instill the drops.

sentences.en: At last the sobs ceased, to be replaced by sniffs.
sentences.cn: 最后呜咽声终于停止了，取而代之的是抽鼻子的声音。

sentences.en: But really, what harm could it possibly do to pop down there and just sniff around?
sentences.cn: 不过说真的，马上赶到那里去打探一下情况会有什么坏处呢？

sentences.en: Have a sniff of this medicine — It'smells revolting, doesn't it?

sentences.en: Have a sniff of this medicine—it smells revolting,doesn't it?

sentences.en: He cleared his nose with a loud sniff.
sentences.cn: 他大声吸气清了清鼻子.

sentences.en: He opened the milk and sniffed it.

sentences.cn: 他的职责就是查究滥用权力的行为.

sentences.en: One sniff of this is enough to kill you.
sentences.cn: 此物闻一闻即足以致命.

sentences.en: She tried to sniff contemptuously, but succeeded in producing only a sniffle.
sentences.cn: 她想用鼻子轻蔑地哼上一声,可是不成, 只发出一声鼻音.

sentences.en: Stop sniffing and blow your nose.
sentences.cn: 别抽鼻子了，擤一擤鼻涕。

sentences.en: Take a sniff at everything and distinguish the good from the bad.
sentences.cn: 对任何东西都要用鼻子嗅一嗅,鉴别其好坏.

sentences.en: The police used dogs to sniff out the criminals in their hiding - place.
sentences.cn: 警察使用警犬查出了罪犯的藏身地点.

sentences.en: Then she caught herself with a sniff at her own absent - mindedness.
sentences.cn: 随即她忽然醒悟起来,对自己的下意识举动一笑置之.

sentences.en: Then, at the first sniff of danger, he was back at his post.
sentences.cn: 然后，他一嗅到危险的气息，便马上回到自己的岗位。

sentences.en: They make bad blood, can't forgive, sniff right , and left for approbation.
sentences.cn: 他们有一些坏作风, 他们不饶人.为了得到公众的承认, 他们四处寻风摸底.

sentences.en: We should take a sniff at everything and distinguish the good from the bad.
sentences.cn: 我们对任何东西都要用鼻子嗅一嗅,鉴别其好坏.
